channel.title: Resources on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Realeases Notes
item.description: Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the TravelgateX GraphQL API. 2018-04-03 ⚠️ Input field accesses was removed from input object type ClientInput ⚠️ Field accesses was removed from object type ClientData ✅ Input field groupID was added to input object type ClientFilter ✅ Field serviceApi was added to object type AdminQuery ✅ Description for enum value BookStatusType.UNKNOWN changed from `The reservation was completed but due to a supplier error or a timeout, the reservation status is unknown.
